reviews.customers_say: Customers find the cashmere sweater beautifully crafted, soft, and comfortable without being scratchy. They appreciate its color quality, with one noting it's not as bright as standard blue, and another mentioning its timeless style. The size receives mixed feedback, with several customers reporting it runs small. While some find it good value for the price, others express mixed opinions about its value.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect in everyway
items.body: This sweater is a beautiful blue not a black navy but a true navy. Very pretty. Fits perfect 1 size up like suggested.it is very soft . I have 4 colors now and would buy more if I could. Very cozy not to hot but just the right weight to keep a summer chill out Read more
items.author: pat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cashmere sweater.
items.body: I love this sweater! The fit for my 5'3" 120 pound figure is not too snug and not too tight, just right. The cashmere is SO soft. The gauge is fine but not too fine. Cashmere is much warmer than wool so a heavy gauge cashmere can only be worn during very cold weather. This sweater is just right for the office. Read more
items.author: Lynne

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small
items.body: It runs a bit small Read more
items.author: Cheryl Walton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: It’s a very nice cashmere sweater Read more
items.author: Placeholder

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived in a clear plastic bag
items.body: It's a good thing we don't have porch pirates...yet...this was shipped in a clear plastic bag with a description, size, and color for all to see. I ordered a size large, in the light blue color. I'm 5' 8" tall apx 138 lbs... the size fits as shown and would be perfectly worn alone but I like to wear a tee/shirt under it. It was a bit snug wearing like that so I ordered another in size XL. The size XL was almost the same size as the L maybe an inch bigger..it's soft and looks good so I am returning the L and keeping the XL.. Read more
items.author: LPG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy lindo
items.body: Muy buena calidad, usualmente soy L pero pedí XL y está perfecto Read more
items.author: Btrix

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Returned
items.body: It is not red! It is burnt orange. I returned it. Beautifully crafted and soft, however. Read more
items.author: Gigi Pratt

items.title: 2.0 out of 5 stars Too small
items.body: I usually am between a L & XL, so I ordered up based on reviews of it running small. This sweater was SO small (almost like a child l/xl). It looked pretty, but I'm returning it due to the sizing. Read more
items.author: SandyP

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Navy, Undyed White, Undyed Natural, Bella Blue, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
